Content-Type: text/plain;

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Eric:
 
>>  <http://example.org/places/> http://example.org/places/{place}
>>  <http://example.org/people/> http://example.org/people/{person}
 
In your example, you used the plural of "place/places" and "person/people."
Can you example why you chose plural, and the pros and cons for singular vs.
plural?
 
Thanks in advance.
 
-Mike Schinkel 
http://www.mikeschinkel.com/blogs/ 
http://www.welldesignedurls.org/
